title: Amy's Son Was Asked To Take Picture With Listener + 'Kyle The Coin Guy' Sits In Lunchbox’s Chair + Bobby’s Mailbag: Who Keeps The Dog In A Breakup?
itunes:title: Amy's Son Was Asked To Take Picture With Listener + 'Kyle The Coin Guy' Sits In Lunchbox’s Chair + Bobby’s Mailbag: Who Keeps The Dog In A Breakup?
description:
Amy's son Stevenson was out in public when a stranger approached him. That stranger was a listener of the show and asked to take a picture with Stevenson, despite the fact that Amy wasn't around. Amy felt it was very inappropriate because she wasn't there to protect him or tell him that he has the option to say yes or no. Kyle from Nashville Gold & Coin stops by and fills in for Lunchbox who is out on paternity leaving having Baby Box No. 2. Plus, Bobby answers a listeners question about who keeps the dog during a break up.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
